tool_description: Generates personalized responses to app store reviews, addressing user concerns and maintaining positive developer-user relationships.

review_text.description: The user review text to respond to

response_tone.description: Desired response tone: professional, friendly, empathetic, or casual

app_name.description: Name of the app being reviewed

include_contact_info.description: Whether to include contact information for follow-up

error_messages: Invalid review rating: Rating must be between 1 and 5.
Invalid response tone: Tone must be 'professional', 'friendly', 'empathetic', or 'casual'.
Review text empty: Review text cannot be empty.
App name missing: App name is required for personalized responses.
usage: Provide review_text, review_rating, and app_name. Optionally set response_tone and include_contact_info preferences. Returns tailored response addressing the review content appropriately.

generated_response.description: Generated response text ready for posting

response_length.description: Character count of the generated response

key_issues_addressed.description: Main issues from the review that were addressed

sentiment_analysis.description: Analysis of the original review sentiment
